text: A new informant reached out using an anonymous ProtonMail account: darktruth2024@protonmail.com. They provided server logs showing connections from 203.0.113.42 to the art gallery's payment portal at https://secure-art-payments.com/checkout. The informant's phone number, given for emergency contact only, was listed as +1-555-867-5309. They also shared a backup Telegram link: https://t.me/+whistleblower_backup_2024. Anna verified the logs were authentic. The IP address 203.0.113.42 had previously been flagged in an Interpol database for suspicious cryptocurrency transactions totaling over 12 BTC.
